languages.text: "Высокофункциональные сервиторы?" {n}Драйвстем задумчиво потирает подбородок большим пальцем.{/n} "Такие сервиторы действительно редки и есть в распоряжении рода Гапрак, но это также может быть лишь повод, чтобы запутать вас. При желании и средствах заиметь этих сервиторов может кто угодно".

traits.locale_text: "Высокофункциональные сервиторы?" {n}Драйвстем задумчиво потирает подбородок большим пальцем.{/n} "Такие сервиторы действительно редки и есть в распоряжении рода Гапрак, но это также может быть лишь повод, чтобы запутать вас. При желании и средствах заиметь этих сервиторов может кто угодно".
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "High-functioning servitors?" {n}Drivestem ponders this, rubbing his chin with his thumb.{/n} "Such servitors are indeed rare and the Gapraks do have them in their service, but this could have been done intentionally with an eye to confusing you. Anyone with the desire and sufficient funds can hire them."
languages.original_text: "Высокофункциональные сервиторы?" {n}Драйвстем задумчиво потирает подбородок большим пальцем.{/n} "Такие сервиторы действительно редки и есть в распоряжении рода Гапрак, но это также может быть лишь повод, чтобы запутать вас. При желании и средствах заиметь этих сервиторов может кто угодно".

traits.locale_text: "The highly-functional Servitors?" {n}Drivestem thinks, rubbing his chin with his thumb.{/n} "Such Servitors are indeed rare and the Gapraks do have them employed, but this could have been done intentionally, to confuse you. Anybody willing enough and with the right amount of money can hire them."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "The highly-functional Servitors?" {n}Drivestem thinks, rubbing his chin with his thumb.{/n} "Such Servitors are indeed rare and the Gapraks do have them employed, but this could have been done intentionally, to confuse you. Anybody willing enough and with the right amount of money can hire them."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

Anybody willing enough and in possession of the right amount of money can hire them."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

Anybody willing enough and in possession of the right amount of money can hire them."

Anyone with the desire and sufficient funds can hire them."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "High-functioning servitors?" {n}Drivestem ponders this, rubbing his chin with his thumb.{/n} "Such servitors are indeed rare and the Gapraks do have them in their service, but this could have been done intentionally with an eye to confusing you. Anyone with the desire and sufficient funds can hire them."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: 「高機能サーヴィター？」{n}ドライブステンは親指で下顎をさすりながら考え込む。{/n}「そういったサーヴィターは確かに貴重ですね。ギャプラック家は雇っているはずですが、これこそ陛下の目を欺く意図かもしれません。意欲と十分な資金があるなら、誰でも雇えるものですから」
languages.original_text: "High-functioning servitors?" {n}Drivestem ponders this, rubbing his chin with his thumb.{/n} "Such servitors are indeed rare and the Gapraks do have them in their service, but this could have been done intentionally with an eye to confusing you. Anyone with the desire and sufficient funds can hire them."

traits.locale_text: 「高機能サーヴィター？」{n}ドライブステンは親指で下顎をさすりながら考え込む。{/n}「そういったサーヴィターは確かに貴重ですね。ギャプラック家は雇っているはずですが、これこそ陛下の目を欺く意図かもしれません。意欲と十分な資金があるなら、誰でも雇えるものですから」
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: “高智能型机仆？”{n}德莱夫斯塔用拇指搓着下巴，陷入了沉思。{/n}“高智能型机仆确实罕见，它们也确实服侍过贾帕克家族。不过，这也可能是对方故布疑阵，挑拨离间。毕竟只要有想法，又肯花大价钱，任何人都可能雇佣它们。”
languages.original_text: "High-functioning servitors?" {n}Drivestem ponders this, rubbing his chin with his thumb.{/n} "Such servitors are indeed rare and the Gapraks do have them in their service, but this could have been done intentionally with an eye to confusing you. Anyone with the desire and sufficient funds can hire them."

traits.locale_text: “高智能型奴工？”{n}德莱夫斯塔用拇指搓着下巴，陷入了沉思。{/n}“高智能型奴工确实罕见，贾帕克家族也确实雇佣过他们。不过，这也可能是对方故布疑阵，挑拨离间。毕竟，只要有想法，又肯花大价钱，任何人都可能雇佣他们。”
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: « Des servitors ultra-performants, vous dites ? » {n}Drivestem réfléchit un instant en se frottant le menton.{/n} « Ce sont en effet des denrées rares. Je sais que les Gaprak en emploient, mais il se pourrait qu'ils aient été envoyés précisément dans le but de détourner votre attention des véritables coupables. Avec un peu de bonne volonté et, il faut l'admettre, beaucoup de moyens, n'importe qui peut en recruter. »
languages.original_text: "High-functioning servitors?" {n}Drivestem ponders this, rubbing his chin with his thumb.{/n} "Such servitors are indeed rare and the Gapraks do have them in their service, but this could have been done intentionally with an eye to confusing you. Anyone with the desire and sufficient funds can hire them."

traits.locale_text: « Des servitors ultra-performants, vous dites ? {n}Drivestem réfléchit un instant en se frottant le menton.{/n} Ce sont en effet des denrées rares. Je sais que les Gaprak en emploient, mais il se pourrait qu'ils aient été envoyés précisément dans le but de détourner votre attention des véritables coupables. Avec un peu de bonne volonté et, il faut l'admettre, beaucoup de moyens, n'importe qui peut en recruter. »
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: «¿Servidores de alto rendimiento?». {n}Drivestem piensa mientras se frota la barbilla con el pulgar.{/n} «Esos servidores no son comunes y los Gaprak los tienen a su servicio, en efecto, pero esto podría haberse hecho con intención de confundirle. Cualquiera lo suficientemente dispuesto y en posesión de los fondos adecuados podría contratarlos».
languages.original_text: "High-functioning servitors?" {n}Drivestem ponders this, rubbing his chin with his thumb.{/n} "Such servitors are indeed rare and the Gapraks do have them in their service, but this could have been done intentionally with an eye to confusing you. Anyone with the desire and sufficient funds can hire them."

traits.locale_text: «¿Los servidores de alto rendimiento?». {n}Drivestem piensa mientras se frota la barbilla con el pulgar.{/n} «Los servidores no son comunes y los Gaprak los tienen como empleados, pero esto podría haberse hecho con intención de confundirle. Cualquiera lo suficientemente dispuesto y en posesión de la cantidad adecuada de dinero podría contratarlos».
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Hochfunktionale Servitoren?" {n}Drivestem denkt nach und reibt sich dabei mit dem Daumen versonnen das Kinn.{/n} "Solche Servitoren sind in der Tat rar, und die Gapraks haben einige davon in ihren Diensten. Das könnte jedoch auch ein Versuch sein, Euch in die Irre zu führen. Jeder mit dem Wunsch und den Mitteln kann sie anheuern."
languages.original_text: "High-functioning servitors?" {n}Drivestem ponders this, rubbing his chin with his thumb.{/n} "Such servitors are indeed rare and the Gapraks do have them in their service, but this could have been done intentionally with an eye to confusing you. Anyone with the desire and sufficient funds can hire them."

traits.locale_text: "Hochfunktionale Servitoren?" {n}Drivestem denkt nach und reibt sich dabei mit dem Daumen versonnen das Kinn.{/n} "Solche Servitoren sind in der Tat rar, und die Gapraks haben einige davon in ihren Diensten. Das könnte jedoch auch ein Versuch sein, Euch in die Irre zu führen. Jeder, der über genügend Geld verfügt, kann solche Servitoren anheuern."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Yüksek işlevli hizmetörler mi?" {n}Drivestem, dediklerine üzerine kafa yorarken baş parmağıyla çenesini ovuyor.{/n} "Bu hizmetörler enderdir, doğru. Gapraklar bunları kullanır. Fakat bu, kafanızı karıştırmak için yapılmış bir hile de olabilir. Parası olan herkes, bu hizmetörleri dilediği gibi istihdam edebilir."
languages.original_text: "High-functioning servitors?" {n}Drivestem ponders this, rubbing his chin with his thumb.{/n} "Such servitors are indeed rare and the Gapraks do have them in their service, but this could have been done intentionally with an eye to confusing you. Anyone with the desire and sufficient funds can hire them."

traits.locale_text: "Yüksek işlevli hizmetörler mi?" {n}Drivestem cümlesinin üzerine düşünürken baş parmağıyla çenesini ovuyor.{/n} "Bu hizmetörler enderdir, doğru. Gaprak hanesi bunları kullanır. Fakat bu, kafanızı karıştırmak için yapılmış bir hile de olabilir. Parası olan herkes, bu hizmetörleri dilediği gibi istihdam edebilir."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor
